comments:
Drag a directory from a Linux-dstore connection to the Remote Scratchboard.
Then drag the directory from the scratchboard and drop it in the scratchboard again (I did this by accident). The following NPE is logged to the PDE Error Log:

The same NPE happens when dragging the PROMPT line or a FILE from a dstore-linux command view to the remote scratchpad.
Client Platform is Windows XP SP1, Eclipse 3.2rc5.
null was being passed as the progress monitor - I've changed this to use a NullProgressMonitor.
